description:
If you choose to wear a mask and gloves that is your choice. But, that should not mean I should have to also. 
If you believe that your mask truly protects you, then me choosing not to wear one, will not effect you at all. 
I think this exercise in freedom grabbing has shown us who will be the first to accept the Mark of the Beast. 
Our freedoms are being taken by fear. These mandates to wear masks and gloves to put people at ease, to make them “feel” safe are just that. To make you “feel”. We know.... the left operates on feelings. Their feelings over facts and over other humans. Don’t forget the government has to look as if they care, as if the millions of tax dollars they give “expert’s” like Fauci and Brix are paying off. 🙄
People are willing to give up their FREEDOMS for the False sense of being safe. 🤦‍♀️ 9/11 proved that. 
They won’t stop here... as I have said.. the next plandemic will be worse. 
They will demand everyone get vaccinated for “your own safety”. Something Hitler said often. 
People are sheep. Fear will be our demise if we don’t fight back. 
#fearless #factsoverfeelings #truth #covid_19 #plandemic #freedom #revolution #wethepeople #iwillnotcomply #1stamendment #2amendment #constitutionalrights #constitution #billofrights #libertyordeath #billgates #id2020
